p: PMS, which has a wide range of psychological, physical, and behavioral symptoms, is one of the most common health problems among women of reproductive ages and is highly prevalent worldwide. Women who are not willing to consume chemical drugs or who are dubious about consuming them might prefer herbal medicine for the treatment of PMS. And this can be considered as one of the main reasons why the use of herbal regimes is well-received in order to treat the symptoms of PMS in these groups [ 42, 43].
